This is a 10-game chat restriction, not a ban. It is the lightest form of penalty given.

It was issued for harassing/blaming other players in game.

You need them to work with you if you want the best chance of winning. So don't be a prick to them. It's pretty simple to understand, although I get it that it is extremely frustrating and difficult to control one's temper in some situations.

Whataboutism is simply a deflection from responsibility.

I could say, "What about nazis? They killed millions of people but some of them escaped punishment, so why should I be punished for something so small as shoplifting?"

It's equally invalid.

You are responsible for your own behavior. Hashinshin is responsible for his. And how Riot chooses to handle other players' punishments is none of your business.
You flamed Sej the whole game, dude. Your previous punishments should have taught you not to do that.
no previous punishments, 10game chat ban lol

A 10-game chat ban is a punishment, though usually there's a 25-game chat restriction before you start getting real bans.

Is this a 14-day ban or a perma?
If you didn't have previous punishments leading up to this and you weren't really toxic in your other games it indeed is unjustified.
